title: What the fuck is the point of playing malphite anymore?
body: He used to be the anti ad champion, but now that conqueror exists, he can easily get shredded by anyone taking it. In my last game, 8k of the 29k damage I took was true damage. Meanwhile the enemy did 10k true damage out of 24k total damage (more than 40% of his damage).

replies.body: The point of playing Malphite is to stack AP and then delete squishies with REQ.

> [{quoted}](name=KFCeytron,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=sEEFNZT3,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2019-01-26T05:17:57.518+0000)
>
> The point of playing Malphite is to stack AP and then delete squishies with REQ.

Pretty much.

AP Malphite is bullshit when you pull it off it feels like cheating. But then again, Riot's balance team cheated him out of his intended identity so I guess it's okay.
So damn annoying in aram. Especially if that has a hard on for you.
Malphite isn't a tank anymore, there is no point in building tank on him if you die anyway after your combo ends, tank malphite useless af.

That said, isn't Conqueror getting removed or something last time I heard?

Please don't be fake news.
go aftershock full ap malphite (be sure to activate ult during your passive with aftershock on to trigger maximum e w damage)  with zhonyas or use a transendence build
